parse.title: List of national capitals by population

text.*:
Lists of capitals
Of countries
  • in alphabetical order
  • by latitude
  • by population
  • Former
  • Purpose-built
  • Capitals, largest and second-largest cities by country
  • Countries with multiple capitals
  • Timeline of country and capital changes
Of country subdivisions
  • Capitals outside the territories they serve
  • Purpose-built
  • v
  • t
  • e

This is a list of national capitals, ordered according to population. Capitals of dependent territories and disputed territories are marked in italics. The population statistics given refer only to the official capital area, and do not include the wider metropolitan/urban district.

Contents

  • 1 List
  • 2 See also
  • 3 Notes and references
  • 4 Bibliography
